name: WATERJAM!
description:
WATERJAM! is a 20-second fast-paced platformer game created by WeJamminGames for the #20SecondGameJam of 2022. 

WASD to move. Spacebar to jump. Mouse1 to Pickup/Throw. Mouse2 to drop. Throw is directional and can be charged. 

Controllers are supported and work in browser! Binds can be found below (we promise we'll add controller prompts ingame soon).

---

LORE: 

YOU are Jamoulis (Jah-moo-lees), a worker in a factory that specializes in creating Waterjam, a special kind of Jam that, when mixed with Water, creates a drinkable glass of water! What an invention! 

On this faithful day, the Waterjam Reactor gets too jam-packed with Waterjam for its own good, putting YOU in a jam! The Jam Room's filling up with Waterjam, and the inconveniently placed gigantic electric coils are going to make the atmosphere too electric to handle! 

Your objective: Get out in 20 seconds! 

Previous Waterjam employees missed the taste of regular jam and hid fruit all around the facility. Can YOU find all the hidden fruit while also making it out alive?

ADVANCED CONTROLS: 

ActionKeyboardXBOX / SteamPlayStationStart Game (Menu)SpacebarACrossMove/SwimWASD/Arrow KeysD-Pad/JoystickD-Pad/JoystickJump/WalljumpSpacebarACrossPick Up ObjectMouse1 / EXSquareThrow ObjectMouse1 / EXSquareDrop ObjectMouse2 / QBCircleRestartRStartStart

TIPS & TRICKS: 

  • Glass is breakable if a Box is thrown with great strength! Maybe you'll find some secrets hidden underneath...
  • Pressing Down in the air will make you fast descent!
  • Holding Jump will make you jump further!
  • Holding Throw will make you throw stronger!
  • Different Fruit give different points!
  • Different point combinations result in different rankings!
  • If you enjoy using the Box to break glass, you might want to take it out with you!
  • Boxes are thrown towards the direction your WASD/Joystick is pointing at!
